descendants.content:
@Snowshadow

Oh, Germany too, they now want to drill for gas in the Wadden Sea World Heritage Site, on its border in the North Sea. It just pisses you off. Everything for profit. There is resistance, but not enough. The Wadden Sea is unique and a very sensitive ecosystem.
